help: Help is on the way, stay put!
approvedMessage: Yeeeyyy !! Congrats. Your application has been approved. Don’t tell your friends you have money!
declinedMessage: Ooopsss. Your application has been declined. It’s not your fault, it’s a financial crisis.
appliedBefore: Ooopsss, you applied before. Wait for notification from us
